law.text:
In consultation with State and local agencies involved in planning, acquiring, and managing open space and recreational lands, the Commission, by January 1, 1987, shall prepare a report to the Governor and the General Assembly recommending State policy and goals for:
The provision of public access along the shoreline of the Chesapeake Bay and its tributaries; and
The reforestation of land within the Critical Area and the preservation of forested land within the Critical Area.
